content: What is the name of the 1997 film, starring Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio, that became the highest-grossing film at the time?

I think I know the film you're referring to. It's "Titanic," released in 1997, starring Kate Winslet as Rose Dewitt Bukater and Leonardo DiCaprio as Jack Dawson. The movie was a massive commercial success and indeed became the highest-grossing film at the time, a title it held until "Avatar," also directed by James Cameron, surpassed it in 2010.
